mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 as rn, seq, title, content, writer, regdate, updated FROM notice, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) as r WHERE seq > 0 AND (@ROWNUM:=0)=0 ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{cri.amount} ) b WHERE b.rn > 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE seq > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( title, content, writer) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.delete: DELETE notice WHERE seq = #{seq} AND writer = #{userid}
